body_html:
Second, we cannot just create a junction to the include directory. Because Bazel cleans up all the output files which means all the files in the original directory will be deleted.

Ouch. Heavy facepalm. Great catch Yun, thanks, also for the patch; I'll apply it now.

body:
> Second, we cannot just create a junction to the include directory. Because Bazel cleans up all the output files which means all the files in the original directory will be deleted. 

Ouch. Heavy facepalm. Great catch Yun, thanks, also for the patch; I'll apply it now.
